version_description:
Fix issue which was preventing notifications working on some iOS 8 devices.

Note: if end-of-session notifications aren't working for you, open Settings, Notifications, Focus Time and make sure that they're enabled.

新增支持 iPad 多任务。
iCloud 同步现在更可靠了。

新增支持 iPad 多任务。
iCloud 同步现在更可靠了。

Fix for issue where sometimes a long break would appear after 3 (rather than 4) work sessions.
新增支持 iPad 多任务。
iCloud 同步现在更可靠了。
Improve reliability of notification sounds when in the background
Fix issue with system dark mode.
